tool_description: Validates citation entries against specified style guidelines, checking format compliance, required fields, and structural correctness.

citation_entries.description: Array of citation entries to validate

validation_level.description: Validation strictness level: strict, moderate, or lenient

check_capitalization.description: Whether to validate title capitalization rules

check_completeness.description: Whether to check for required fields completeness

publication_types.description: Expected publication types to validate against

error_messages: Empty citation array: Provide at least one citation entry for validation.
Unsupported target style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard, Vancouver].
Invalid validation level: Use one of [strict, moderate, lenient].
Invalid publication types: Use valid types from [journal, book, conference, thesis, website].
Validation processing error: Unable to process citations due to severe formatting issues.
usage: Submit citation entries with target style and validation preferences to receive detailed compliance checking and error identification.

valid_citations.description: Number of citations that passed validation

invalid_citations.description: Number of citations with validation errors

error_details.description: Detailed error descriptions for each invalid citation
